text: DZRH-TV (digital UHF channel 39) is a Philippine television station owned by Radyo Natin Network and operated by its affiliate Manila Broadcasting Company in the Philippines. The station's studio is located at the Second Floor, MBC Building, Star City, Vicente Sotto St., CCP Complex, Roxas Boulevard, Pasay; while its transmitter is located at the BSA Twin Towers, Bank Drive, Ortigas Center, Mandaluyong. ==Digital channels== UHF Channel 40 (629.143 MHz) Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Note 39.01 480i 16:9 DZRH TV DZRH News Television Test Broadcast 39.31 240p 4:3 DZRH TV 1SEG DZRH News Television 1seg == Areas of Coverage == === Primary areas === * Metro Manila * Cavite * Bulacan * Laguna * Rizal === Secondary Areas === * Portion of Pampanga * Portion of Nueva Ecija * Portion of Bataan * Portion of Batangas ==Related pages== *List of Manila Broadcasting Company stations ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Filipino television stations Category:2022 establishments in the Philippines
title: DZRH-TV
